title: big A
content:
hey everyone.  
i found this image onlune and was wondering if anyone know what type this is.

i only have the image of the “a”

thanks everyone

author: jmcalo1

comments.content:
Hi Jason,

my guess is that this is custom. [Pistilli Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121234354/http:/typophile.com/node/2156) is close, but not available in digital format. Have a look at [Didoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121234354/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/urw_didoni_normal/?sample_text=a&sample_size=388).  
F
